summary: Frontend verification complete: Dark-themed login page displays correctly, email login flow works with test credentials, and the Claude.ai-style UI renders properly on /app/* routes with EkaSidebar and EkaTopBar components.

issues: Console warning: chart width/height -1 - minor Recharts sizing issue on initial load (existing issue from previous iterations)

passed_tests: Frontend: Dark-themed login page displays correctly at root URL (/) with bg-[#0D0D0D]
Frontend: Login page data-testid='login-page' found
Frontend: EKA-AI branding visible on login page
Frontend: Google login button (data-testid='google-login-btn') visible
Frontend: Email input (data-testid='email-input') accepts testuser@test.com
Frontend: 'Continue with email' button (data-testid='email-submit-btn') works
Frontend: Password field (data-testid='password-input') appears after clicking Continue
Frontend: Password input accepts test123456
Frontend: Login redirects to /app/dashboard after successful authentication
Frontend: EkaSidebar renders with EKAAI logo on /app/dashboard
Frontend: EkaSidebar New Chat button visible
Frontend: EkaSidebar nav items visible (Dashboard, Job Cards, PDI Checklist, Fleet Mgmt, Invoices)
Frontend: EkaSidebar Settings button visible
Frontend: EkaTopBar renders with 'Dashboard' title on /app/dashboard
Frontend: /app/chat page loads with Claude.ai-style UI
Frontend: EkaTopBar shows 'EKA-AI Chat' title on chat page
Frontend: Chat page welcome message visible: 'How can I help with the garage today?'
Frontend: All 4 suggestion chips visible on chat page
Frontend: 'AUTOMOBILE DOMAIN LOCKED' badge visible on chat page
Frontend: Chat input area visible with placeholder 'Describe the vehicle issue...'
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI revert verification complete. The dark-themed login page at root URL (/) is displaying correctly with all form elements. Email login flow works as expected with the test credentials. After login, users are redirected to /app/dashboard where both EkaSidebar and EkaTopBar components render properly. The /app/chat page shows the Claude.ai-style interface with welcome message, suggestion chips, and chat input. Minor chart sizing warning persists but is non-blocking.

verified_components.LoginPage: Dark theme, email/password form, Google login button all working
verified_components.EkaSidebar: Logo, New Chat, nav items (Dashboard, Job Cards, PDI Checklist, Fleet Mgmt, Invoices), Settings, user profile all visible
verified_components.EkaTopBar: Title, intelligence mode selector (Gemini Flash), notification bell, user avatar all visible
verified_components.EkaChatPage: Welcome message, 4 suggestion chips, domain locked badge, chat input all rendering correctly
